summary: A configuration container that encapsulates all common constraints and defaults required by Primer3 for internal probe design, including size, melting temperature, GC content, homopolymer limits, dinucleotide runs, ambiguous base allowances, and thermodynamic thresholds for self‑complementarity and hairpin formation, and can translate these settings into Primer3 input tags.
business_intent: Enable users to define and enforce precise probe design criteria when invoking Primer3, ensuring thermodynamic evaluation of oligo self‑binding and producing reliable probe sets for applications such as qPCR, diagnostics, and other nucleic‑acid detection workflows.
